events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the smartphone screen is cracked and it doesn't respond properly to touch.
The case was labeled as a product defect due to the customer's report of a cracked and malfunctioning smartphone screen.
Customer support agent Mike was assigned to handle the case regarding the defective smartphone screen reported by the customer.
Hello! I’m Mike from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your smartphone screen. Let’s see how we can resolve this quickly for you.
Could you please provide a photo of the cracked screen along with the order number and the date you received the device? This will help us verify the defect.
Here are photos of the cracked screen, and my order number is 567829340. I received the package just yesterday as scheduled.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement unit shipped immediately at no cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option suits you best.
I would prefer a replacement unit sent as soon as possible. Thanks for the quick response and clear options.
We have processed your replacement order, which will be shipped within 24 hours. A tracking number will be sent to your email shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your replacement smartphone and that everything is working properly now.
Yes, I got the replacement yesterday and it works perfectly. Thank you again for the smooth process and excellent support.
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing this support case now. Feel free to reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey so we can improve our service. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.
